name: fugitive
content:

a person who is running away or hiding from the police or a dangerous situation: Thousands of fugitives are fleeing from the war-torn area.fugitive from justice Butch Cassidy and the Sundance Kid were fugitives from justice (= they ran away to avoid being tried in court).
